T02D1285:140a-0: @140a * // dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1285:140a-1: dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro la //
T02D1285:140a-2: btud de dang bas phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1285:140a-3: sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D1285:140a-4: gtor ma'i cho ga bri bar bya //
T02D1285:140a-5: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1285:140a-6: skad cig tsam gyis stong par bsgoms la /
T02D1285:140a-7: de nas h'um zhes brjod de /
T02D1285:140a-8: h'um las skad cig tsam gyis rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D1285:140a-9: ra ba dang dra ba'i nang du khams gsum gyi
T02D1285:140a-10: sems can thams cad dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa
T02D1285:140a-11: la lha'i dkyil 'khor du bskyed la /
T02D1285:140a-12: bdag nyid kyang de'i mdun du he ru ka'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02D1285:140a-15: cod pan gyi lha dran par bsrung par bya'o //
T02D1285:140a-16: de nas 'og tu yam ram las rlung dang me bskyed la /
T02D1285:140a-18: de'i nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi ldan bsam /
T02D1285:140a-19: de'i steng gi bar snang la h'um las zla ba'i steng du rdo rje bskyed /
T02D1285:140a-20: rlung gis me sbar mes bdud rtsi bskol ba'i 'od
T02D1285:140a-21: kyis zla ba dang rdo rje yang thim nas lha'i
T02D1285:140a-24: de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste bstims la /
T02D1285:140a-25: yi ge 'bru gsum gyi sngags lan gsum bzlas pas /
T02D1285:140a-27: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi lha spyan drangs nas /
T02D1285:140a-28: aam shr'i he ru ka ma h'a badzra a'a gatstsha aa aa aa gha ta aa /
T02D1285:140a-29: pra be sha ya bra be sha ya /
T02D1285:140a-31: to sha ya to sha ya /
T02D1285:140a-32: sarbba badzra d'a ki n'i hri da ya h'um h'um phat phat ces brjod la /
T02D1285:140a-33: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la bstims la /
T02D1285:140a-34: yang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod do //
T02D1285:140a-35: de nas lha rnams par dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag
T02D1285:140a-36: po rnams kyi lce h'um las rdo rje nas 'bru
T02D1285:140a-37: tsam bsams la / de'i rtse mor h'um bsgoms te /
T02D1285:140a-38: de'i 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi drangs nas /
T02D1285:140a-39: gsol bas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes thob par bsam mo //
T02D1285:140a-40: sngags ni aom shr'i he ru ka badzra pra t'itstsha mam ba lim h'um phat /
T02D1285:140a-41: aom buddha d'a ki n'i pra t'itstsha mam bi lam aom phat /
T02D1285:140a-42: aom badzra d'a ki n'i pra t'itstsha mam la lim h'um phat /
T02D1285:140a-43: aom ratna d'a ki n'i pra t'itstsha mam ba lim tr'am phat /
T02D1285:140a-44: aom bi shva d'a ki n'i pra t'i tstsha mam ba lim aa phat /
T02D1285:140a-45: aom sarba d'a ki n'i pra t'itsatsh mam ba lim h'um phat /
T02D1285:140b-0: aom sarbba yo gi n'i pra t'itsatsh mam ba lim h'um @140b ha ha he ho:/
T02D1285:140b-1: de nas de nyid lnga pas bstod pa ni //
T02D1285:140b-2: mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che //
T02D1285:140b-3: rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02D1285:140b-4: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1285:140b-6: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag / rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02D1285:140b-7: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog / sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1285:140b-8: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1285:140b-9: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1285:140b-10: dngos gnyis dag pa gos pa med //
T02D1285:140b-13: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1285:140b-14: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1285:140b-16: rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za //
T02D1285:140b-17: bsam pa thams cad yongs rtogs pa //
T02D1285:140b-18: sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02D1285:140b-20: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1285:140b-21: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D1285:140b-22: gzur du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1285:140b-23: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02D1285:140b-24: ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa med //
T02D1285:140b-25: de ltar chos 'di shes nas kyang //
T02D1285:140b-26: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D1285:140b-27: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02D1285:140b-28: aom a'a: h'um yul che ge mo zhes bya ba
T02D1285:140b-29: la sogs pa'i kshe tra p'a la ai dam ba
T02D1285:140b-30: lim grihna ma mas pa ri w'a r'a na sarba
T02D1285:140b-31: satva nydza pa'a pam bya ti bi shnam sh'asnim ku
T02D1285:140b-33: a'a tu argham a'a di pu shtim ku ru sarba pra ya tstsha raksha ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1285:140b-34: sems can thams cad nad med cing /
T02D1285:140b-35: sems can thams cad bde gyur nas //
T02D1285:140b-36: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad gyur pa'i //
T02D1285:140b-37: lam de nyid la 'gro bar shog / ma grol ba rnams grol ba dang //
T02D1285:140b-38: ma brgal ba rnams sgrol byed cing //
T02D1285:140b-39: rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas pa ni //
T02D1285:140b-40: da lta nyid du gnas par shog / de'i 'og
T02D1285:140b-41: tu yi ge 'bru gsum gyis zhi ba la sogs
T02D1285:140b-43: de nas aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes brjod //
